title.narrative: Strengthening Multi-Sectoral Nutrition Programming through Implementation Science

description.narrative: (Bangladesh): In line with Bangladesh's second National Plan of Action on Nutrition (NPAN-2), the Strengthening Multi-Sectoral Nutrition Programming through Implementation Science (MSN) will focus on critical issues to address malnutrition among adolescent girls, women and under five children, and develop new evidence on the best approaches to realize these goals. With FY 2020 funds, MSN will implement new implementation research activities focusing on improving nutrition for vulnerable populations through sub-grants provided to local and international partners under an Innovation Fund portfolio. Possible areas of focus include improving nutritional status of adolescent girls in urban slums, revitalizing adolescent clubs in the rural areas, ICT based nutrition governance in the Chittagong Hill Tracts etc. Findings from these research interventions will enable the Government of Bangladesh, private sector players, and other key stakeholders respond to key nutrition gaps in Bangladesh by generating and utilizing cutting-edge research evidence..This activity will support the U.S. National Security Strategy Pillar IV, the State-USAID Joint Strategic Plan Goal Two, and the U.S. government's mission objective of improved health status in Bangladesh..... .
